name: Bolivar (Non Cuban) - Cofradia - No. 654 Toro
additionalNotes: Fashioned in a true old-world Cuban style fashion , this classic Cuban Corona from the Bolivar Cofradia line has big-time flavor. Its sweet smoky aroma originates from a stunning Ecuadorian Sumatra wrapper making it hearty and spicy. A premium blend of Honduran and Nicaraguan long fillers gives it a full-bodied flavor profile of pepper, roasted nuts, coffee and earth tones.
